trans-unit.source: Represents the lengths of elements within the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示內的項目長度<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> class with an absolute value in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>類別絕對值像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The absolute pixel value (96 pixels-per-inch) to initialize the length to.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的長度的絕對像素值 （96 像素為單位每英吋）。

trans-unit.source: pixels is , , or .
trans-unit.target: pixelsis , , or .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> class with a specified value and unit.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>類別具有指定的值和單位。

trans-unit.source: The requested size of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目要求的大小。

trans-unit.source: The type that is used to determine how the size of the element is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 用來判斷如何計算項目的大小的型別。

trans-unit.target: valueis , , or .

trans-unit.target: -or- type is not , , , , or .

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>類別指定的值、 單元、 所要的值，並顯示值。

trans-unit.source: The requested size of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目要求的大小。

trans-unit.source: The type that is used to determine how the size of the element is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 用來判斷如何計算項目的大小的型別。

trans-unit.source: The calculated size needed for the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目所需的導出的大小。

trans-unit.source: The allocated size for the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目配置的大小。

trans-unit.target: -or- displayValue is or .

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> structure that represents the standard automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>結構，代表標準的自動調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: The standard automatic sizing mode sizes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> columns based on the contents of both cells and column headers.
trans-unit.target: 標準的自動調整大小模式大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>儲存格和資料行標頭的內容為基礎的資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> structure that represents the standard automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> </xref>結構，代表標準的自動調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the calculated pixel value needed for the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目所需的導出的像素值。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels calculated for the size of the element.
trans-unit.target: 針對項目的大小計算的像素數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the pixel value allocated for the size of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得配置給項目的大小的像素值。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels allocated for the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目配置的像素數目。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於目前<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前的執行個體比較的物件。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>與相同的值或與目前的調整大小模式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>是否等於目前<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> </xref>要與目前的執行個體相比較。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> with the same value or sizing mode as the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>與相同的值或與目前的調整大小模式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 取得的雜湊碼<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的雜湊碼<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance sizes elements based on a fixed pixel value.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個執行個體大小項目是否為基礎的固定像素值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements based on both the content of cells and the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個執行個體是否自動大小基礎的資料格的內容和資料行標頭的元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType*>屬性設定為<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements based on the content of the cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個執行個體是否自動調整儲存格的內容為基礎的項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements based on the header.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個執行個體是否自動調整根據的標頭項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements based on a weighted proportion of available space.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個執行個體是否自動大小可用空間的加權比例為基礎的項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>来比較的執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 第二個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>来比較的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> instances have the same value or sizing mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>結構，以判斷它們是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>来比較的執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 第二個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>来比較的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> structure that represents the cell-based automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>結構，表示資料格為基礎的自動調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: The cell-based automatic sizing mode sizes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> columns based on the contents of cells in the column, not including column headers.
trans-unit.target: 資料格為基礎的自動調整大小模式大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>資料行，不包含資料行標頭中的儲存格的內容為基礎的資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This sizing mode will cause columns to expand if content that is larger than the current column size is scrolled into view.
trans-unit.target: 此調整大小模式會以展開如果內容的資料行大於目前的資料行大小捲動到檢視。

trans-unit.source: The column will not shrink after the content is scrolled out of view.
trans-unit.target: 內容捲動到檢視之後，將不會縮減資料行。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> structure that represents the cell-based automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> </xref>結構，表示資料格為基礎的自動調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> structure that represents the header-based automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>結構，表示標頭為基礎的自動調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: The header-based automatic sizing mode sizes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> columns based on the contents of column headers only.
trans-unit.target: 標頭為基礎的自動調整大小模式大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>只資料行行首的內容為基礎的資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> structure that represents the header-based automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"> </xref>結構，表示標頭為基礎的自動調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represent the current object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表目前的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that is used to determine how the size of the element is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來判斷如何計算項目的大小的類型。

trans-unit.source: A type that represents how size is determined.
trans-unit.target: 表示如何決定大小的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the absolute value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 取得數值的絕對值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The absolute value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> in pixels, or 1.0 if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 數值的絕對值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>像素，或如果 1.0<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType*>屬性設定為<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType*>
